content: the little lake monster is an adorable amphibian designed for hours of play outdoors or inside this friendly crochet monster is inspired by the legend of champ the lake champlain monster this pattern is one of 24 free patterns in the toy box crochet along with cal central crochet 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain single_crochet slip_stitch crocheting in the round increasing joining with whipstitch seam joining with single_crochet seam crocheting over yarn tails includes video tutorials special stitches bob invdec invdecbl decrease includes written descriptions and video tutorials in pattern **skill level** easy **finished size** one size 15 38 cm long when assembled **materials** cascade yarns pacific chunky effects yarn 60% acrylic/40% superwash wool 3 5 oz/100 g 120 yd/110 m 1 skein each in 305 snapdragon ca and 310 ultramarine green cb *or approximately 70 yd 64 m in ca and 75 yd 68 5 m in cb in any smooth bulky weight yarn * us size 7/4 5 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge * stitch markers yarn needle fiber filling safety eyes - 1 pair i used 12 mm pink cat safety eyes **gauge** *exact gauge is not critical for this project stitches should be small so fiber filling doesn t show through * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/03/03/2025-toy-box-crochet-along/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2025/05/28/little-lake-crochet-monster-pattern/
